data.name: LINE HACKATHON 2020: 1st Place Award of Student Category
desc: Developed a friendly chatbot "NAMA" specialized in organizing group gatherings, enriching the value of time and friendship using LINE and Google technologies.
Designed the content, features, motion graphics, UI, developed the front-end pages, and executed the pitching presentation.

data.name: Teaching Assistant (Object Oriented Programming)
desc: Collaborated with instructor to grade coursework and assist students on their programming challenges.

data.name: Google Developer Student Core Team
desc: Facilitates and manages the Google developer community’s activities.
Participating in the Google Developer Student Clubs Solution Challenge (Ongoing project "ThumbD")

data.name: Mahidol University International Relations Ambassador 2019
desc: Selected as one of 20 students to represent Mahidol university for various international guests and international conferences.
Selected as one of the Top 5 Star Ambassadors.

data.name: Virus: First Runner Up Short Film
desc: Created a short film raising the cyberbullying issue in Thailand.

data.name: The Parliament Hackathon Participant
desc: Redesigned the User Experience and User Interface of the parliament’s complaint platform (Prototype)
